title: Exquisite Emerald Floral Haaram - A Timeless Elegance
materials: Sparkling Cubic Zirconia. Features a rich Hyderabadi polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This modern Haaram showcases a delicate floral motif, meticulously crafted with shimmering Cubic Zirconia petals that surround vibrant Emeralds. The dual-layered design adds depth and sophistication. The necklace features a secure and elegant clasp for comfortable wear. Contemporary design with classical influences.
occasions: or as a statement piece for upscale evening events. A beautiful addition to a bridal trousseau (pellikuturu).
description: This stunning Haaram is a testament to timeless elegance and modern design. The vibrant Emeralds symbolize prosperity and new beginnings, making it an ideal gift or heirloom. Its lightweight design ensures comfortable wear. The classic floral design and two-layer design makes a unique fashion statement
